sqoop.arg: SELECT PalletID,PalletNo,PartID,InvStateID,Quantity,CurrentQuantity,Locked,Complete,CreatedDT,CompletedDT,MachineStageID,PrincipleWOID,PalletIndex,ModulePartID,Merged,PadLock,IsBtoCto, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_Pallet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionDeviceID,AcquisitionVariableTypeID,WorkstationConfigID,Instructions,ImageURI,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput,FillMode,Preset,Multiplier,PreprocessingFunction,IsManualTrigger,IsManualConfirm, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionDevice WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionNoteID,ActionID,Note,Comments,NoteDT,LoginID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionNote WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AssetID,AssetName,RfAssetTypeID,LineID,MachineStageID,ToolID,GaugeID,PartID,InventoryPackID,LocationID,IsRetired,CostCentreID,ManufacturerID,SupplierID,AcquiredDT,PONumber,OrderedDT,ExpectedDeliveryDT,ExpectedFirstUseDT,EndUseDT,EndUseReason,PurchaseCost,DefaultLocationID,Comments, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Asset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AttributeTypeID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,ImageURI,RfAttributeClassID,IsPassFail,IsRaiseCA,LikelyCauses,Impact,Weighting,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,AttributeTypeCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT BOMVariantID,BOMVariant,PartID,IsDefault,BOMVariantIndex,IsRetired,LoginID,DT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernStatusID,ConcernStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DefectCountID,MeasurementSetID,HeadNo,DefectCount,Ignored,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DefectCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultID,Fault,FaultComments,AssetID,MaintenanceWorkID,ReportedByLoginID,FaultReportedDT,CommonFaultID,FaultStateID,TimeToRespond,TimeToRepair,TimeResponseToRepair,RevisionNo,IsEdited,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Cause,MachineStopID,Symptoms, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Fault WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryUsageID,StartUsingComments,StopUsingComments,StartLoginID,StopLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedEndDT,SavedStartDT,SavedEndDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedInventoryUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineInfoID,ModifiedDT,IsOEEInventoryIsolation,IsOEEInventoryReintroduction,IsOEESpoilage,IsOEEDowntime,IsOEEInventoryProduction,NoBottlenecks,BottleneckMachineStageID,IsCountOutputInventory,IsCountInputInventory,IsOEEProductionUnits,LoginID,SessionID,PlantID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfoRecalc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartDefID,SPCChartSetViewID,Sequence,LkCDefInCViewID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkCDefInCView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCRuleID,RfCutByID,LkCutBySPCRuleID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkCutBySPCRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,FaultID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkFaultMaintWork WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageID,MachineGroupID,LkMGMSID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMGMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartDocumentID,PartID,DocumentID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartDocument WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RfSPCStatID,SPCStatsStyleID,LkSPCStatsStyleRfSPCStatID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKSPCStatsStyleRfSPCStat_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,RfViolationRuleID,LkVCOCVRuleID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkVCOCVRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageEventID,LoginID,DT,MachineStageID,MachineStageEventTypeID,Comments, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageEvent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopReasonGroupID,MachineStopReasonGroup,Description,MachineStopReasonGroupCode, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopReasonGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceProcedureGroupID,MaintenanceProcedureGroup,Description, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,WorkDone,Comments,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWork_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SerialNo,TimePacked,IMS_No, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ModulePackedDateTime_Buffer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCItemID,OPCServerID,OPCGroupID,TagName,TagAddress,RfOPCItemTypeID,IsNotify,RawValue,UpdatedDT,Quality,Value,LastRawValue,LastUpdatedDT,LastQuality,LastValue,MachineStageID,ChangeAction,PLCID,IsDatedOnServer,IsStoredAsArray,IsActive,MachineStageEventTypeID,RfTransitionTypeID,TransitionToValue, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItem WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCSpeedID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCSpeed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartTypeID,PartType,Description,PartTypeCode,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID,RfInventoryAccountingModeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RootCauseID,RootCause,Comments,RootCauseTypeID,LineTypeID,MachineStageTypeID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.RootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantDefaultsID,StartOfDay,StartOfWeek,StartOfYear,RfLocaleID,RfDefaultCurrencyID,DataEntryDefaultURI,OnDataCommitGoTo,ChainToStopped,ColourStagesForCurrentJob,UnAckAlarmsPeriod,ShowOverdueIcon,ShowAlarmIcon,WONumberModeID,IsShowVarClassCombo,IsShowAcqClassCombo,RfMachineStopRecordModeID,IsAutoCreateProductsForParts,IsAutoCreateProductTypeForPart,EnforceClosedAlarms,ColourOrder,IsAutoReleaseJob,JobClose,IsAllowDuplicateWONumbers,WoClose,IsOverdueRefToJob,DefaultSPCCalcStyleID,IsAllowInventoryInserts, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantDefaults WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftSequenceID,ShiftPatternID,ShiftTypeID,Sequence,ShiftStartTime,ShiftEndTime, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftSequence WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartSet,AcquisitionID,SPCURI,RfDataBandID,NPeriods,SpecTypeID,IsRunningProductOnly,LHSessionID,MaxTrendRecallWindow, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCStatsStyleID,SPCStatsStyle,IsSystem, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCStatsStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListValueID,TagListID,TagListValue,DisplayOrder,IsRetired, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagListValue WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTypeID,RfDataTypeID,Name,TagTypeCode,ISSYSTEM,TAGVIEW, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolID,Supplier,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,Ident, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolGroup,Description,ToolGroupCode, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT FromUnitID,ToUnitID,Multiplier,UnitConversionID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitConversion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeClassID,VariableTypeClass,Description,Priority, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeClass WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionProcedureID,WorkInstructionProcedure,WorkInstructionRef,PartID,IsEdited,FromDT,ToDT,RevisionNo,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionProcedure WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStage.MachineStageID, MachineStage.MachineStageTypeID, MachineStage.Name, MachineStage.IsRetired, MachineStage.DepartmentID, MachineStage.Description, MachineStage.CurrentShiftPatternID, MachineStage.NoHeads, MachineStage.IsOEEBottleNeck, MachineStage.IsProductionOutput, MachineStage.MachineStopID, MachineStage.StoppedScreenThreshold, MachineStage.LineSectionID, MachineStage.IsDiscrete, MachineStage.RfDowntimeCollectionModeID, MachineStage.RfSpoilageCollectionModeID, MachineStage.RfProductionCollectionModeID, MachineStage.LastBuildRecordID, MachineStage.CurrentJobID, MachineStage_Custom.ModuleDatabase, MachineStage_Custom.IntendedWOID, MachineStage_Custom.MachineStageCode, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM MachineStage FULL JOIN MachineStage_Custom ON (MachineStage.MachineStageID = MachineStage_Custom.MachineStageID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
